modal-profilesettings-details-text-expla: Feel free to change any profile information. This is the basis of your public Part-up profile.
modal-profilesettings-email-text-explain: We love to keep you up to date on your part-ups in the notifications. If it helps you to keep connected, we can also send you email updates. Do you like to reduce or increase the number of email updates? Change your update preferences below.
modal-profilesettings-email-dailydigest: with a daily digest of my notifications
modal-profilesettings-email-upper_mentio: when you're mentioned in a part-up
modal-profilesettings-email-invite_upper: when you're invited to contribute to an activity
when you're invited to join a tribe
modal-profilesettings-email-partup_creat: when a part-up is created in a tribe you're a member of
modal-profilesettings-email-updatesucces: Part-up created in network email enabled
Part-up created in network email disabled
modal-profilesettings-email-partups_netw: when an upper requests access to your tribe
when you got accepted to a tribe
modal-profilesettings-email-invite_upper: when you're invited to a part-up
modal-profilesettings-email-partups_new_: when an upper replies to a conversation you're involved in
modal-profilesettings-email-partups_netw: when an upper joins a tribe you're a member of
modal-profilesettings-email-updatesucces: New upper in tribe email enabled
New upper in tribe email disabled
modal-profilesettings-email-partups_netw: when an upper has left your tribe
modal-profilesettings-email-updateerror-: Something went wrong, please try again
pages-app-emailsettings-confirmation-tit: Are you sure you want to disable all automatic emails?
Are you sure you want to disable this automatic email?
pages-app-emailsettings-confirmation-mes: If you want to enable or disable a particular type of email, you can change this in your account settings.
modal-profilesettings-account-text-expla: Here, you can edit your account settings. Do you want to update your profile? You can find the link in the menu on the left.
modal-profilesettings-account-hint-socia: If you want, you can connect your social media profiles. It gives you a richer part-up profile, which helps us to match you better.
modal-profilesettings-account-label-lang: In what language do you want to live your Partup experience?
modal-profilesettings-account-hint-langu: You can choose the language for all buttons and updates. The content of part-ups is not (yet) being translated. Untill then, you can use a translation plugin in your browser.
